assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HRSA_OathText
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Swear (or solemnly affirm) that I will faithfully and honestly fulfill the duties that devolve on me by reason of my employment in the public service of Canada and that I will not, without due authority, disclose or make known any matter that comes to my knowledge by reason of such employment. (If you are subscribing under Oath, also say "So help me God" o other name of deity).
